Verses: 1 yaakkobu Pirayaanampannugaiyil, Dhevadhoodhargal Avanaich Sandhiththaargal.
2 yaakkobu Avargalaik Kandapodhu: Idhu Dhevanudaiya Senai Endru Solli, Andha Sthalaththirku Maknaayeem Endru Perittaan.
3 pinbu, Yaakkobu Edhom Seemaiyaagiya Seyeer Dhesaththilirukkira Than Sagodharanaagiya Esaavinidaththukkup Pogumpadi Aatkalai Azhaippiththu:
4 neengal En Aandavanaagiya Esaavinidaththil Poi, Naan Idhuvaraikkum Laabaanidaththil Thangiyirundhen Endrum,

5 enakku Erudhugalum, Kazhudhaigalum, Aadugalum, Velaikkaararum, Velaikkaarigalum Undendrum, Ummudaiya Kangalil Enakkuth Dhayavukidaikkaththakkadhaaga Aandavanaagiya Umakku Idhai Arivikkumpadi Aatkalai Anuppinen Endrum Ummudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Yaakkobu Sollachsonnaan Endru Sollumpadi Kattalaikoduththuth Thanakku Munnaaga Avargalai Anuppinaan.
6 andha Aatkal Yaakkobinitaththukkuth Thirumpivandhu: Naangal Ummudaiya Sagodharanaagiya Esaavinitaththukkup Poivandhom; Avarum Naanooruperote Ummai Edhirkolla Varukiraar Endraargal.
7 appozhudhu Yaakkobu Migavum Bayandhu, Viyaagulappattu, Thannidaththilirundha Janangalaiyum Aadumaadugalaiyum Ottagangalaiyum Irandu Pagudhiyaagap Piriththu:
8 esaa Oru Pakudhiyinmel Vizhundhu Adhai Muriya Atiththaalum, Matrap Pakudhi Thappiththukkolla Itam Untu Endraan.

9 pinbu Yaakkobu: En Thagappanaagiya Aabiragaamin Dhevanum, En Thagappanaagiya Eesaakkin Dhevanumaai Irukkiravare: Un Dhesaththukkum Un Inaththaaridaththukkum Thirumpippo, Unakku Nanmai Seyven Endru Ennudane Solliyirukkira Karththaave,

10 adiyenukku Dhevareer Kaanbiththa Ellaa Dhayavukkum Ellaa Saththiyaththukkum Naan Evvalavenum Paaththiran Alla, Naan Kolum Kaiyumaai Indha Yordhaanaik Kadandhuponen; Ippozhudhu Ivvirandu Parivaarangalaiyum Udaiyavanaanen.
11 en Sagodharanaagiya Esaavin Kaikku Ennaith Thappuviyum, Avan Vandhu Ennaiyum Pillaigalaiyum Thaaimaargalaiyum Muriya Adippaan Endru Avanukku Naan Bayandhirukkiren.
12 dhevareero: Naan Unakku Meyyaagave Nanmaiseydhu, Un Sandhadhiyai Ennimutiyaadha Gatarkarai Manalaippola Migavum Perugappannuven Endru Sonneere Endraan.
13 andru Raaththiri Avan Ange Thangi, Than Kaikku Udhavinavaigalile Than Sagodharanaagiya Esaavukku Vegumaanamaaga,
14 irunooru Vellaadugalaiyum, Irubadhu Vellaattuk Kadaakkalaiyum, Irunooru Semmariyaadugalaiyum, Irubadhu Aattukkadaakkalaiyum,

15 paal Kodukkira Muppadhu Ottagangalaiyum, Avaigalin Kuttigalaiyum, Naarpadhu Kadaarigalaiyum, Paththuk Kaalaigalaiyum, Irubadhu Kolikaik Kazhudhaigalaiyum, Paththuk Kazhudhaikkuttigalaiyum Piriththeduththu,
16 velaikkaarar Kaiyil Ovvoru Mandhaiyai Thaniththaniyaaga Oppuviththu, Neengal Mandhai Mandhaikku Munnum Pinnumaaga Idam Vittu Enakku Munnaaga Ottikkondupongal Endru Than Velaikkaararukkuch Solli,
17 munne Pogiravanai Nokki: En Sagodharanaagiya Esaa Unakku Edhirppattu: Nee Yaarudaiyavan? Enge Pogiraai? Unakkumun Pogira Mandhai Yaarudaiyadhu? Endru Unnaik Kettaal,
18 nee: Idhu Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya Yaakkobudaiyadhu; Idhu En Aandavanaagiya Esaavukku Anuppappatukira Vegumadhi; Idho, Avanum Engal Pinne Varugiraan Endru Sol Endraan.
19 irandaam Moondraam Velaikkaaranaiyum, Mandhaigalin Pinnaale Pogira Anaivaraiyum Nokki: Neengalum Esaavaik Kaanumpodhu, Indhappirakaaramaaga Avanode Solli,

20 idho, Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya Yaakkobu Engal Pinnaale Varugiraan Endrum Sollungal Endru Kattalaiyittaan; Munne Vegumadhiyai Anuppi, Avanaich Saandhappaduththikkondu, Pinbu Avan Mugaththaip Paarppen, Appozhudhu Oruvelai Enperil Thayavaayiruppaan Endraan.
21 andhappadiye Vegumadhi Avanukkumun Poyitru; Avano Andru Raaththiri Paalayaththile Thangi,
22 raaththiriyil Ezhundhirundhu, Than Irandu Manaivigalaiyum, Than Irandu Panividaikkaarigalaiyum, Thannudaiya Padhinoru Kumaararaiyum Koottikkondu, Yaappokku Engira Aatrin Thuraiyaik Kadandhaan.
23 avargalaiyum Serththu, Aatraik Katakkappanni, Thanakku Undaana Yaavaiyum Akkaraippatuththinaan.
24  Yaakkobu Pindhith Thariththirundhaan; Appozhudhu Oru Purushan Pozhudhu Vidiyumalavum Avanudane Poraadi,
25 avanai Merkollaadhadhaik Kandu, Avanudaiya Thotaichchandhaith Thottaar; Adhinaal Avarudane Poraadukaiyil Yaakkobin Thotaichchandhu Sulukkitru.
26  Avar: Naan Pogattum, Pozhudhu Vitikiradhu Endraar. Adharku Avan: Neer Ennai Aaseervadhiththaalozhiya Ummaip Pogaviden Endraan.
27 avar: Un Per Enna Endru Kettaar; Yaakkobu Endraan.
28 appozhudhu Avar: Un Per Ini Yaakkobu Ennappadaamal Isravel Ennappadum; Dhevanodum Manidharodum Poraadi Merkondaaye Endraar.
29 appozhudhu Yaakkobu: Ummudaiya Naamaththai Enakku Arivikgavendum Endru Kettaan; Adharku Avar: Nee En Naamaththaik Ketpaanen Endru Solli, Ange Avanai Aaseervadhiththaar.
30 appozhudhu Yaakkobu: Naan Dhevanai Mugamugamaaik Kanden, Uyir Thappip Pizhaiththen Endru Solli, Andha Sthalaththukku Peniyel Endru Perittaan.
31 avan Peniyelaik Kadandhu Pogaiyil, Sooriyan Udhayamaayitru; Avan Thodaichchulukkinaale Nondi Nondi Natandhaan.
32 avar Yaakkobudaiya Thodaich Chandhu Narampaith Thottapadiyaal, Isravel Puththirar Innaalvaraikkum Thotaichchandhu Narambaip Pusikkiradhillai.
